think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob in question, in this case, 'enable_hashjoin' from PostgreSQL. 2. Research its function and possible settings. 3. Determine if it has any non-standard values that significantly alter its behavior. 4. Check if these values disrupt the natural numerical order or provide a completely different functionality compared to other settings. 5. Conclude if it is a 'special knob' based on the presence of such special values.
